text: Hennadiy Makarov (; 10 July 1939) is a former professional Soviet football midfielder and coach. ==References == ==External links== * * Oleksiy Hrachov. One has to correspond to Sevastopol! (Алексей Грачев. Севастополю надо соответствовать!). FC Sevastopol. title: Hennadiy Makarov
